Posts.Content: Princess1214 wrote: Hi all, I was wondering at what point on your mammogram results and MRI results do they post a Birads Score.  I've gotten copies of both my mammo and MRI and no scores are listed.  I have cysts in my left and right breasts with 6 clusters of micro calcifications in my right.  I will be going back in 6 months for another MRI and mammogram. Thank you! Elizabeth Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: When do they assign a Birads Score Princess1214 Princess1214
